Text: anyone who has problem to extract this to the XBOX? it stops by BackgroundMyMusic.png
VaktBleppe : Disk full on xbox ? using latest winrar on pc - FATX errors (do these exist?) on XBOX HDD ?

Gasgiver... FatX errors do infact happen but I'm unaware of any potential quick fixes such as the Xbox equivellent of scandisk. The times I've encountered corruption I have temporarily installed a modchip and ran XBpartitioner and reinstalled all files for the system partition and another time I simply unlocked the drive in my computer and used Xbox Harddisk Driver to copy over the system and user partitions from a good image. I really hope he's not trying to do a system partition install.

That aside can you do another build off the recent FAT version? Love those scripts and other tweaks you add.

Tackar GasGiver !!
